metadata.title: CVE-2022-1637 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Web Contents in Google Chrome prior to101.0.4951.64 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
